headline: Can Fox (FOXA) Leverage AI Partnerships to Strengthen Its Long-Term Digital Strategy?
summary: Fox Advertising and Mobian recently announced a partnership that will integrate Mobian's AI-powered intelligence tools into the FOX Converged Media Platform to enhance data-driven advertising and measurement capabilities across FOX's portfolio, beginning with FOX News Media. This collaboration introduces advanced AI solutions for unified audience insights, contextual ad placement, and performance measurement without relying on personal data, aiming to deliver increased value to advertisers...

headline: Fox Valuation Under Spotlight After Holywater Investment and a 41% Price Surge
summary: Thinking about whether Fox stock is a buy, hold, or steer clear? You are not alone. With its share price at $58.10 right now, Fox has been making headlines and moving in unexpected ways, drawing attention from both everyday investors and Wall Street watchers. After an eye-catching climb of 41.2% over the last year and an even bigger run of 111.6% over three years, momentum is clearly on the side of long-term holders. Even so, recent weeks have included a few bumps. The stock dipped 5.3% over...
